awd_titl_txt: Cyber Defense Bootcamp for High School Technology Teachers

por.por_cntn:
• Improve Cyber Security awareness of participating high school teachers:

 Our lectures and hands-on-exercises covered some aspects of Cyber Law and ethics, Cyber Threats and what is at risk, and how users can better protect their systems and Networks.

  • Provide participating teachers with the opportunity to learn the fundamentals of Cyber Security:

Our lectures and hands-on-exercises covered major areas of Cyber Security including System Security, Cryptography, Reconnaissance, Passport Cracking, Wireless Security, and Intrusion Detection and Recovery.

  • Provide participating teachers with a complete set of course material to take to their home institutions:

We have given the participants soft copies of all our lectures and lab exercises. Paper copies of all the hands-on exercises were also given to all participants, ahead of the practice session, so they could follow the instructions easier and take notes. Also we gave them an electronic copy of the “First Principles”.

  • Provide participating teachers mentoring help so they can introduce Cyber Security topics in the courses they teach and help them create Cyber Defense clubs, so their students learn how to better protect their systems for many years to come:

Our Cyber defense Club members and us have offered our help, any time during the year, as teachers are introducing Cyber Security in their courses or organizing Cyber Defense Clubs at their schools. Participants were given contact information of our Cyber Defense club members helping in the Bootcamp. Teachers are encouraged to contact us and/or our Cyber Defense club members, for help during the school year.

  • Introduce teachers to the CyberPatroit and other nationally organized high school Cyber Defense competitions and encourage them to participate:

We talked about CyberPatriot and we stressed the importance of sending teams to CyberPatriot competition. Our lab exercises and the lectures should help them prepare their students for the competition.


Last Modified: 12/27/2016
Modified by: Mohammad H Heydari
